title: Python Environment Details
body_html:
Python Environment Details

Python Version

Python 3.11.2 (GCC 12.2.0)

Available Libraries

Standard Library Modules

  • json ✓
  • os ✓
  • sys ✓
  • datetime ✓
  • math ✓
  • random ✓
  • urllib ✓
  • http ✓
  • pathlib ✓
  • collections ✓
  • typing ✓

Third-Party Libraries

  • requests ✓
  • numpy ✓
  • pandas ✓
  • bs4 (BeautifulSoup4) ✓
  • aiohttp ✓
  • flask ✓
  • sqlalchemy ✓
  • django ✗
  • pyyaml ✗

Capabilities Based on Available Libraries

  1. Data Processing

    • NumPy for numerical computations
    • Pandas for data manipulation and analysis
    • JSON handling through built-in json module

  2. Web Interaction

    • HTTP requests via requests library
    • Async capabilities with aiohttp
    • Web scraping with BeautifulSoup4
    • Web application development with Flask

  3. System Operations

    • File system operations (os, pathlib)
    • System information access (sys)
    • Random number generation
    • Date and time handling

  4. Database Operations

    • SQL database interaction through SQLAlchemy

Potential Applications

  1. Data Analysis Scripts

    • Statistical analysis with NumPy
    • Data manipulation with Pandas
    • CSV/JSON data processing

  2. Web Scraping and API Integration

    • Fetch web content
    • Parse HTML/XML
    • Interact with REST APIs

  3. Automation Tasks

    • File management
    • Data transformation
    • Scheduled operations

Limitations

  1. Missing Libraries

    • No Django (full web framework)
    • No YAML support (pyyaml missing)

  2. Security Considerations

    • Direct system command execution restricted
    • File system access needs testing
    • Network access capabilities need verification

Next Steps for Testing

  1. Test file system access permissions
  2. Verify network request limitations
  3. Explore maximum execution time
  4. Test memory usage limits
  5. Verify database connection capabilities
